description:
iML1515core
Metabolic core model of Escherichia coli str. K-12 substr. MG1655 derived from iML1515 similar as ECC2 was derived from iJO1366.

Contains:
600 genes + 1 pseudo gene for spontaneous reactions
509 metabolites
586 reactions

Publications:
Monk, J. M., Lloyd, C. J., Brunk, E., Mih, N., Sastry, A., King, Z., Takeuchi, R., Nomura, W., Zhang, Z., Mori, H., Feist, A. M., & Palsson, B. O. (2017). iML1515, a knowledgebase that computes Escherichia coli traits. Nature biotechnology, 35(10), 904–908. https://doi.org/10.1038/nbt.3956
